<link href="{{ mix('/css/app.css') }}" rel="stylesheet">
<script src="{{ asset('js/console.js') }}"></script> <script src="{{ mix('/js/app.js') }}" defer></script>

template.name: html
template.value:
<!doctype html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0"> <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge"> <meta name="csrf-token" content="{{ csrf_token() }}">
<link href="{{ mix('/css/app.css') }}" rel="stylesheet">
<script src="{{ asset('js/console.js') }}"></script> <script src="{{ mix('/js/app.js') }}" defer></script>
<title>Title</title> </head> <body> $<body>$ </body> </html>
